column2: "Afei Jakob tsee dɛ eburow wɔ Egypt
column3: na ɔsee ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column4: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom hwehwɛɛhwɛ hom enyim nkorkor yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ
column4: matse dɛ eburow wɔ Egypt: hom nkɔ hɔ na hom nkɔtɔ bi wɔ hɔ mbrɛ hɛn; ama yaatsena ase

column2: "Na Josef no nuanom du no kɔr Egypt dɛ wɔrokɔtɔ eburow;"
"na Josef no nua Benjamin dze
column3: Jakob amma ɔannye no nuanom no annkɔ; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Bɛyɛ na mbusu bi ato no."

column2: "Na Israel ne mba no foraforaa hɔn a wɔbae no hɔn mu baa atɔ; osiandɛ nna ɔkɔm no esi Keenan asaase do."
"Nna Josef na ɔyɛ asaase no do ambrado; ɔno na ɔtɔn edziban ma asaase no do nkorɔfo nyinara: na Josef no nuanom no bae
column3: na wɔbɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa no dze hɔn enyim bumboom famu."

column2: "Na Josef hun no nuanom no
column3: ohun hɔn
column4: na ɔyɛɛ noho ɔhɔho wɔ hɔn enyim
column5: na ɔnye hɔn kasaa ebufuw do. Obisaa hɔn dɛ
column6: Hom fi hen bae? Na wɔsee dɛ
column7: Yefi Keenan asaase do bɔtɔɔ edziban."

column2: "Na Josef hun no nuanom no
column3: na hɔn dze
column4: woennhu no."

column2: "Na Josef kaa daa a ɔsosoo no hɔn ho no
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom yɛ akwanserafo; asaase yi n'adagyaw na hom bae bɔhwɛe."

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Dabida
column4: mo wura
column5: na wo nkowaa bae dɛ wɔrobɔtɔ edziban."

column2: "Hɛn nyinara yɛ nyimpa kor mba; yɛyɛ anokwafo
column3: wo nkowaa nnyɛ akwanserafo bi."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Dabida
column4: na asaase yi n'adagyaw na hom bae bɔhwɛe."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Wo nkowaa yɛ enuanom duebien
column4: nyimpa baako mba wɔ Keenan asaase do; na hwɛ
column5: ɔkaekyir no mpo wɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn ndɛ ara

column2: "Na Josef see hɔn dɛ
column3: Iyi ntsi na mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ
column4: Hom yɛ akwanserafo no."

column2: "Dza wɔdze bɔsɔ hom ahwɛ nye yi: dɛ Farao tse ase yi hom nnkefi ha akɔ
column3: gyedɛ hom nua kakraba no aba ha ana."

column2: "Hom nsoma hom mu baako ma ɔnkɛfa hom nua no mbra
column3: na hom dze
column4: wɔdze hom bogu efiadze ama wɔaasɔ hom nsɛm ahwɛ
column5: dɛ nokwar wɔ hom mu anaa: annyɛ dɛm dze a
column6: na ɔno dɛ Farao tse ase yi ampaara hom yɛ akwanserafo."

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn nyinara koguu efiadze ndaansa."
"Na ne ndaansa no Josef see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nyɛ yi
column4: na hom ntsena ase; osiandɛ musuro Nyankopɔn:"

column2: "sɛ hom yɛ anokwafo a
column3: ɔno wɔmma wɔnkyekyer hom nuanom mu baako wɔ efiadze mbrɛ hom da yi; na hom dze
column4: hom nkɔ

column2: "na wɔnkɛfa hom nua kakraba no mbrɛ me; nna mubohu dɛ hom nsɛm yɛ nokwar
column3: na hom nnkowu. Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Yedzi hɛn nua no ho fɔ ampaara
column4: dɛ hɛnara yehun n'ahohiahia wɔ aber a ɔrototɔ serɛ hɛn no
column5: na yeenntsie; dɛm ntsi na dɛm ahohiahia yi aba hɛn do yi."

column2: "Na Reuben buaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Mannka annkyerɛ hom dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnyɛ bɔn nntsia abofra no; na hom enntsie? Dɛm ntsi hwɛ

column2: "Nna wonnyim dɛ Josef tse kasa no ase; osiandɛ oyianofo gyina hɔn ntamu."
"Na ɔdaan noho fii hɔn nkyɛn
column3: na okosui; na ɔsanee baa hɔn nkyɛn
column4: na ɔbɛkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn
column5: na oyii Simeon wɔ hɔn mu
column6: na ɔkyekyeer no wɔ hɔn enyim hɔ."

column2: "Na Josef hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa eburow nhyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku amaama
column3: na wɔmfa hɔn nyinara hɔn sika nhyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku mu nkorkor
column4: na wɔmma hɔn kwan mu edziban: na wɔyɛɛ hɔn dɛm."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn eburow no soasoaa hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ
column3: na wosii mu fii hɔ."

column2: "Na hɔn mu baako saan no kotoku dɛ ɔrema n'asoasopɔnkɔ edziban wɔ asoɛe no
column3: ohun dɛ ne sika no hyɛ no kotoku ano."

column2: "Na ɔsee no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Wɔdze me sika asan ama me; hwɛ
column4: ɔhyɛ mo kotoku mu: na hɔn akoma tutui
column5: na wɔdze ahopopo sesee hɔnho dɛ
column6: Ebɛnadze na Nyankopɔn ayɛ hɛn yi?"

column2: "Na wɔbaa hɔn egya Jakob hɔ wɔ Keenan asaase do
column3: na wɔbɛkaa dza ɔbaa hɔn do nyinara kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column5: "banyin no a ɔyɛ asaase no wura no nye hɛn kasaa ebufuw do
column6: na ɔfaa hɛn dɛ yɛyɛ ɔman no ho akwanserafo:"

column2: "na yɛsee no dɛ
column3: Yɛyɛ anokwafo; na yɛnnyɛ akwanserafo."

column2: "Yɛyɛ enuanom duebien
column3: egyamba; ɔbaako na onnyi hɔ
column4: na ekumaba no wɔ hɛn egya nkyɛn wɔ Keenan asaase do ndɛ ara."

column2: "Na banyin no
column3: mekyerɛ asaase wura no
column4: see hɛn dɛ
column5: Dza medze bohu dɛ hom yɛ anokwafo nye yi; hom ndan hom nuanom mu baako ngya me nkyɛn

column2: "na hom nkɛfa hom nua kakraba no mbrɛ me: nna mubohu dɛ hom nnyɛ akwanserafo
column3: na dɛ hom yɛ anokwafo: nna mibeyi hom nua no ama hom
column4: na hom edzi gua wɔ asaase yi do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ wohuehuee hɔn nkotoku mu eburow no
column3: nna nyimpa biara ne sikaboa wɔ no kotoku mu: na aber a hɔn nye hɔn egya hun hɔn sika mboaba no
column4: hɔn akoma tui."

column2: "Ma hɔn egya Jakob see hɔn dɛ
column3: Emi na hom ama mahwer me mba: Josef nnyi hɔ
column4: na Simeon nnyi hɔ
column5: na hom rebɛfa Benjamin so akɔ: iyi nyinara aba mo do."

column2: "Na Reuben kaa kyerɛɛ n'egya dɛ
column3: Sɛ mammfa no ammbrɛ wo bio a
column4: ku me mbabanyin beenu no: fa no hyɛ me nsa
column5: na medze no bɛbrɛ wo bio."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Me ba nnkɛnye hom akɔ; osiandɛ no nua ewu
column4: na aka no nko: sɛ mbusu bi ba no do wɔ kwan a wɔnam mu rokɔ no mu a
column5: ɔno hom dze mo gon nam awerɛhow mu bɔkɔ nda mu."
